articles.description: The country's big banks are increasingly attempting to lure prospective borrowers with attractively priced fixed-rate home loans.
articles.content:
As a result, by the end of September, the interest rates on new fixed-rate loans were around 55 to 65 basis points below new variable rate loans.

articles.author: Ingrid Fuary-Wagner
articles.title: Pre-Christmas rush begins in Sydney property market - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: In Sydney 76 per cent of the 776 properties scheduled for auction sold on Saturday, while in Melbourne 68 per cent of 480 homes sold under the hammer.
